00081 #ifndef VLIB_TILER_H_
00082 #define VLIB_TILER_H_ 1
00083 
00084 #include "VLIB_types.h"
00085 
00100 typedef enum {
00101     TILE_TYPE_8U  = 0,      
00102     TILE_TYPE_8S  = 1,      
00103     TILE_TYPE_16U = 2,      
00104     TILE_TYPE_16S = 3,      
00105     TILE_TYPE_32U = 4,      
00106     TILE_TYPE_32S = 5,      
00107     TILE_TYPE_32F = 6,      
00108     TILE_TYPE_64F = 7,      
00109     TILE_TYPE_MAX = 8       
00111 }eTileTypes_t;
00112 
00113 #define TILE_TYPE_BIT_POS    (uint32_t)(0)
00114 #define TILE_TYPE_BIT_LENGTH (uint32_t)(4)
00115 #define TILE_TYPE_BIT_MASK   (uint32_t)(0x000F)
00116 
00117 #define TILE_CH_BIT_POS      (TILE_TYPE_BIT_POS + TILE_TYPE_BIT_LENGTH)
00118 #define TILE_CH_BIT_LENGTH   (9)
00119 #define TILE_CH_BIT_MASK     (uint32_t)(0x01FF)
00120 
00121 #define TILE_CONTIGUOUS_BIT_POS (TILE_CH_BIT_POS + TILE_CH_BIT_LENGTH)
00122 #define TILE_CONTIGUOUS_BIT_LENGTH (1)
00123 #define TILE_CONTIGUOUS_BIT_MASK   (0x0001)
00124 
00125 #define SET_TILE_TYPE(flag, type) \
00126     {\
00127         uint32_t    bits = (1 << TILE_TYPE_BIT_LENGTH) - 1;\
00128         uint32_t    mask  = ~(bits << TILE_TYPE_BIT_POS);\
00129         flag = flag & mask;\
00130         flag = flag | (type << TILE_TYPE_BIT_POS);\
00131     }
00132 
00133 #define SET_TILE_CH(flag, ch) \
00134     {\
00135         uint32_t    bits = (1 << TILE_CH_BIT_LENGTH) - 1;\
00136         uint32_t    mask  = ~(bits << TILE_CH_BIT_POS);\
00137         flag = flag & mask;\
00138         flag = flag | (ch << TILE_CH_BIT_POS);\
00139     }
00140 
00141 #define SET_TILE_CONTIGUOUS(flag, contiguous) \
00142     {\
00143         uint32_t    bits = (1 << TILE_CONTIGUOUS_BIT_LENGTH) - 1;\
00144         uint32_t    mask  = ~(bits << TILE_CONTIGUOUS_BIT_POS);\
00145         flag = flag & mask;\
00146         flag = flag | (contiguous << TILE_CONTIGUOUS_BIT_POS);\
00147     }
00148 
00149 #define GET_TILE_TYPE(flag, type) \
00150     {\
00151         type = (flag >> TILE_TYPE_BIT_POS) & TILE_TYPE_BIT_MASK;\
00152     }
00153 
00154 #define GET_TILE_CH(flag, ch) \
00155     {\
00156         ch = (flag >> TILE_CH_BIT_POS) & TILE_CH_BIT_MASK;\
00157     }
00158 
00159 #define GET_TILE_CONTIGUOUS(flag, contiguous) \
00160     {\
00161         contiguous = (flag >> TILE_CONTIGUOUS_BIT_POS) & TILE_CONTIGUOUS_BIT_MASK;\
00162     }
00163 
00176 typedef struct {
00177     void    *data;      
00178     int32_t  rows;      
00179     int32_t  cols;      
00180     int32_t  pitch;     
00181     uint32_t flags;     
00183 }sBuffer_t;
00184 
00185 #endif  /* VLIB_TILER_H_ */
00186
